room_title: Escape room "The Caretaker" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: Had so much fun failing! The Caretaker room was HARD but definitely entertaining. Was our first time and we would come back in a heart beat. Shoutout to Noely very nice and super helpful.

room_title: Escape room "The Caretaker" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: This was my first time at the Sawgrass location and it was an absolute blast!! My group tackled their hardest room, The Caretaker, it was creepy and eerie, just in time for Halloween! It was so cool to see how immersive and just overall interactive the room itself was, the puzzles we're challenging but really cool to solve, and Jessica was an awesome game host when it came to helpful hints. Thanks again to the entire staff for making it a wonderful experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Caretaker" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: We had so much fun at this location! We almost escaped from The Caretaker! The staff was super nice and engaging. I was thoroughly impressed. They gave us some riddles before the room was room was ready. The room was AMAZINGLY decorated. Blew every other room I've done out of the water! Great experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Caretaker" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: Even though we failed, we had soooo much fun and can't wait to try the next escape rooms!!! And we loved our clue giver Steven. Such a cool experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Caretaker" by America's Escape Game in Miami
review: What a great experience. By far the toughest room we've faced down here in South Florida!!! Can't wait for the next rooms!
